Physically-delivered futures means it's possible for merchants to hedge BTC/Fiat exchange risk without having to cash-out Bitcoin payments as fiat in bank accounts. This is good for the Bitcoin circular economy: BTC sale can become BTC wage w/o volatility or going back into fiat.
